verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> Moses' <S%H8334>servant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4872>"Moses<s%> My <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H4191>dead;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> to them, to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H1869>treads,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to you, <S%H9201>just<s%> as I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

"From the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> toward the <S%H3996>setting<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> will be your <S%H1366>territory.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will [be able to] <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life.<s%> <S%H9201>Just<s%> as I have <S%H1961>been<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I will be with you; I will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> you or <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you.

"Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> for you shall <S%H5157>give<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5157>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> them.

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H553>courageous;<s%> be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; do not <S%H5493>turn<s%> from it to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that you may <S%H7919>have<s%> <S%H7919>success<s%> <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H1980>go.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> but you shall <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on it <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that you may be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in it; for <S%H227>then<s%> you will <S%H6743>make<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous,<s%> and <S%H227>then<s%> you will <S%H7919>have<s%> <S%H7919>success.<s%>

"Have I not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you? Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous!<s%> Do not <S%H6206>tremble<s%> or be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is with you <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

<S%H5674>"Pass<s%> through the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> and <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3559>'Prepare<s%> <S%H6720>provisions<s%> for yourselves, for <S%H5750>within<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you are to <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you, to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.'"
And to the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> and to the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5117>gives<s%> you <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>'

"Your <S%H802>wives,<s%> your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and your <S%H4735>cattle<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> but you shall <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> in <S%H2571>battle<s%> <S%H2571>array,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warriors,<s%> and shall <S%H5826>help<s%> them,

<S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5117>gives<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H5117>rest,<s%> as [He gives] you, and they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> them. Then you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to your <S%H3425>own<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise.<s%> <S%H8121><s%> "

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>"All<s%> that you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us we will <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H413>wherever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H7971>send<s%> us we will <S%H1980>go.<s%>

<S%H3605>"Just<s%> <S%H834><s%> as we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> we will <S%H8085>obey<s%> you; <S%H7534>only<s%> may the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> be with you, as He was with <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H3605>"Anyone<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4784>rebels<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> your <S%H6310>command<s%> and does not <S%H8085>obey<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6680>command<s%> him, shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous.<s%>"
